title: Mysterious Island (1961) 720p 5.1 Blu-ray
description:
|-------------------------------------------------------------|
|----------Mysterious Island (1961) 720p 5.1 Blu-ray----------|
|-------------------------------------------------------------|

TITLE: Mysterious Island
YEAR: 1961
LANGUAGE: English
SUBTITLES: English, Spanish, French, German & Portuguese

SOURCE: Blu-ray Disc
VIDEO CODEC: H.264
AUDIO CODEC: AAC-LC 5.1 (6 Channels)
CONTAINER: MP4
RESOLUTION: 1200 x 720 ( 1.66 : 1 ) [ Original Aspect Ratio ]
RUN-TIME: 01:40:45

NOTES: The film has a lot of natural grain (more evident during the optical effect scenes) -- considering the age of the film, cameras, optical effects & technical limitations of the time -- this is normal & to be expected of the source material. The Blu-ray transfer restores the original aspect ratio of 1.66:1 (The DVD Transfer had an AR of 1.85:1 due to the source being cropped at the top & bottom of the image).

SYNOPSIS: During the US Civil War, Union POWs escape in a balloon and end up stranded on a South Pacific island which is inhabited by giant creatures. They must use their ingenuity to survive the dangerous environment.
